meanings.definition: Constituting one of eleven equal parts.
meanings.sent1: She divided the cake into elevenths portions for all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The team won the game with their elevenths player scoring the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The elevenths cupcake in the display looked like a tiny treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her elevenths sense told her that something was about to happen.
meanings.sent5: The elevenths star in the sky shone brighter than the rest.

meanings.definition: The eleventh member of a series.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the hero was the elevenths to join the quest.
meanings.sent2: The elevenths in line finally got their turn to enter the museum.
meanings.sent3: The elevenths student to arrive was greeted with cheers from the class.
meanings.sent4: She felt like the elevenths wheel on a bicycle, always turning but never noticed.
meanings.sent5: The elevenths book on the shelf seemed to glow with a mysterious aura.

meanings.definition: The fraction equal to one divided by eleven.
meanings.sent1: She added two elevenths of a cup of sugar to the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for three elevenths of a teaspoon of salt.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he only had elevenths of a brain left after studying for the exam.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him felt like trying to fit elevenths of a heart into a whole.
meanings.sent5: The elevenths of the pie left were just enough for a small slice for each person.
